SCRIPT.MSCRI:
!------------------------------------------ LOGGING INPUT PARAMETERS ------------------------------------------ : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_PAM.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCE : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
! CAPAM PATH : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "CAPAM PATH" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_PAM_PATH#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! ALIAS : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "ALIAS" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_PAM_ALIAS#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! ENCRYPRT : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "ENCRYPRT" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_PAM_ENCRYPT#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
export CSPM_CLIENT_HOME=&UC4RB_PAM_PATH#
! Define action specific java options and values : SET &ACTION_NAME# = "GetCredential"
! Custom java directories : set &JAVA_BINDIR#="&UC4RB_PAM_PATH#/cspmclient_thirdparty/java/bin/"
!Directory containing the class to execute (same as our directory) classDir=`dirname $0`
!Name of class to execute CLASS_NAME="com.automic.capam.client.Client"
!add our client's Java to library path to pickup our cryptography library LIB="&UC4RB_PAM_PATH#/cspmclient/lib"
: SET &CLASS_PATH#= "&UC4RB_PAM_PATH#/cspmclient/lib/cspmclient.jar:" : SET &CLASS_PATH# = STR_CAT(&CLASS_PATH#, "&UC4RB_PAM_PATH#/cspmclient/lib/bc-fips-1.0.0.jar:") : SET &CLASS_PATH# = STR_CAT(&CLASS_PATH#, "&UC4RB_PAM_PATH_JAR#:")
!Reterive Password CLASS_PATH=&CLASS_PATH#
: SET &UC4RB_PAM_CMD# = "&JAVA_BINDIR#java -classpath $CLASS_PATH" : SET &UC4RB_PAM_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_PAM_CMD#, ' "-Djava.library.path=$LIB" "-Dcspm_client_config_file=/home/automic/cspm/catech/cspmclient/config/cspm_client_config.xml" $CLASS_NAME') : SET &UC4RB_PAM_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_PAM_CMD#, " -action GetCredential") : SET &UC4RB_PAM_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_PAM_CMD#, " -alias '&UC4RB_PAM_ALIAS#'")
output="$(&UC4RB_PAM_CMD#)" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX statusCode="$(echo "${output}" | grep Status | cut -d\: -f2 | cut -d ' ' -f 2)" password="$(echo "${output}" | grep Password | awk -F 'Password:' '{print $2}' | xargs)"
!Condition for fail case "$statusCode" in "405") echo "No data found for specific alias." ; exit 1 ;; "406") echo "Application Error. See System log for details" ; exit 1 ;; "410") echo "Unauthorized execution path." ; exit 1 ;; "411") echo "Unauthorized execution path." ; exit 1 ;; esac
!Encrypt Secret : IF &UC4RB_PAM_ENCRYPT# <> 'NO' : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_PAM.PUB.INCLUDE.ENCRYPT_SECRET password=$UC4_ENCRYPTED_PWD : ENDIF
echo UC4RB_PASSWORD::=$password
